title: कोरोना वायरस : मलयेशिया सरकार के ‘रेस्ट्रिक्टेड मूवमेंट ऑर्डर’ को PMO के आदेश के रूप में शेयर किया गया
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim: Claim: A Press Release regarding movement restriction is widely getting circulated on #WhatsApp claiming to be of Government of India.#PIBFactCheck: No such Press Release has been issued by @PMOIndia. pic.twitter.com/6CQOJUhSpG
